channel.title: NPC chat
channel.description:
Ok i have sorted the chat and everything and it all works, but after the first text on the npc it closes and there's 3 more 2 do.
What do i have to do???

item.title: NPC chat
item.dc:creator: @chippeh chippeh
item.description:
@chippeh wrote:

Search for NPCDIALOGUE from the top and keep searching until you find code that looks like:
npcdialogue = 1 || npcdialogue = 2 || npcdialogue = 3
or something like that, normally you would put the npc dia of the one you have say…

case 1: talk("lul text goes here1"); break; case 2: talk("lul text goes here12"); break; case 3: talk("lul text goes here123"); break; case 4: talk("lul text goes here1234"); break;

with the npcdialogue = 1 and that you should be able to have it go upto 4… Sorry I can’t explain this more clearly… this is all just from the top of my head…

Read full topic

item.description:
